title: Clash of Kings Tournament!!!
description:
Hey guys,

You are invited to a Medieval 2 total war tournament!  If you want to join a fun Tournament hosted by me and TheRyanKing, let me know.  Contact me through steam or Youtube!

Steam: apollo203
